## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3c77bf97c7fa506294389252c6bdf8c7918abe5aa4b0cb2956217963d11e33a6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'simple-web-app-package' @ 3.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
